1 <?php
2 
3 namespace Ubiquity\controllers\rest;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\cache\system\ArrayCache;
6 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UArray;
7 
17 class ApiTokens {
18  protected $tokens;
19  protected $length;
20  protected $duration;
21  protected static $cache;
22 
23  public function __construct($length = 10, $duration = 3600, $tokens = []) {
24  $this->length = $length ?? 10;
25  $this->duration = $duration ?? 3600;
26  $this->tokens = $tokens;
27  }
28 
29  protected function generateToken() {
30  do {
31  $token = $this->tokenGenerator ();
32  } while ( \array_search ( $token, $this->tokens, true ) === true );
33  return $token;
34  }
35 
36  protected function tokenGenerator() {
37  return \bin2hex ( \random_bytes ( $this->length ) );
38  }
39 
40  public function getTokens() {
41  return $this->tokens;
42  }
43 
44  public function getDuration() {
45  return $this->duration;
46  }
47 
48  public function getToken($key) {
49  if (isset ( $this->tokens [$key] ))
50  return $this->tokens [$key];
51  return false;
52  }
53 
54  public function isExpired($key) {
55  $token = $this->getToken ( $key );
56  if ($token !== false)
57  return \time () - $token ["creationTime"] > $this->duration;
58  return true;
59  }
60 
61  public function addToken() {
62  $key = $this->generateToken ();
63  $this->tokens [$key] = [ "creationTime" => \time () ];
64  return $key;
65  }
66 
67  public function clearAll() {
68  $this->tokens = [ ];
69  }
70 
71  public function removeExpireds() {
72  $tokens = $this->tokens;
73  foreach ( $tokens as $key => $value ) {
74  if ($this->isExpired ( $key )) {
75  unset ( $this->tokens [$key] );
76  }
77  }
78  }
79 
80  public function remove($key) {
81  if (isset ( $this->tokens [$key] )) {
82  unset ( $this->tokens [$key] );
83  return true;
84  }
85  return false;
86  }
87 
88  public function storeToCache($key = "_apiTokens") {
89  $fileContent = [ "duration" => $this->duration,"length" => $this->length,"tokens" => $this->tokens ];
90  self::$cache->store ( $key, "return " . UArray::asPhpArray ( $fileContent, "array" ) . ";" );
91  }
92 
99  public function getFromCache($folder, $key = "_apiTokens") {
100  if (! isset ( self::$cache )) {
101  self::$cache = new ArrayCache ( $folder . "rest/tokens", ".rest" );
102  }
103  if (self::$cache->exists ( $key )) {
104  $filecontent = self::$cache->fetch ( $key );
105  if (isset ( $filecontent ["tokens"] )) {
106  $this->tokens = $filecontent ["tokens"];
107  }
108  if (isset ( $filecontent ["length"] )) {
109  $this->length = $filecontent ["length"];
110  }
111  if (isset ( $filecontent ["duration"] )) {
112  $this->duration = $filecontent ["duration"];
113  }
114  }
115  return $this;
116  }
117 }
